CustomField.description: Formula field representing the value displayed on the Billing Forecast page for this billing forecast detail category. If an override value is present, it is displayed. If no override value is present, the sum of the roll-up variance and original billing forecast value is displayed. If there is no override value or roll-up variance, the original billing forecast value is displayed.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Formula field representing the value displayed on the Billing Forecast page for this billing forecast detail category.
CustomField.label: Adjusted Value
